title: Game Decided Before Loading Screen.
body: Not sure how to feel about the fact that I managed to roll three absolutely toxic players at once. The chat got worse than this once we got into game. Maybe I should have dodged but I just don't see why people like this even bother.

replies.body:
ALOT and i mean AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOTTTTTTTTTTTTTT

Of OCE players seem to think each game when they login is about their personal glory and looking like the biggest baddest killing muthaf**a in the game. 

Never mind that Mobas are a team game, never mind communication in the character selection screen can lead to results where all are happy with team comp's and are doing something they enjoy....

Its just the "No fu*k you im playing my game" mentality i hate and why i made my club

People do not comprehend teamwork is key and a great team fight/skirmish is more enjoyable than your personal glory.

The actual win doesn't matter so much.
The kind words of these strangers have touched my heart in ways no one ever could {{champion:6}}
Yet I can say "I would appreciate it if you would stop verbally abusing me please" and get perma banned. I love Riot Games.
